casebody.data:
GREGOR, Respondent, v. NIEDERMAN, Appellant. (City Court of New York,

General Term.

October 29, 1900.) Action by Bret Gregor against August Niederman, as president. From a judgment in favor of the plaintiff, defendant appeals. Affirmed. Bernhard Rabbino, for appellant. Francis J. Nekerda, for respondent. PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with -costs.
